title: 客户端崩溃。
author: Worf丶Horo
txt_content:
RT，错误报告。而且有时候启动游戏会白屏。

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 2020-03-01 02:13:03 GMT+08:00
Description: Initializing game

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
卸载原有的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... b78b671c754eaaf38ab

然后，在启动器中分配更多的内存

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 你好 1024MB带不动那么多MOD  尝试分多点试试
